label: ID column
description: Column containing a unique participant identifier

label: Value column
description: Column containing numeric values for each measure

label: Measure column
description: Column containing measure names

label: Lower Limit of Normal column
description: Column containing the numeric lower limit of normal for each measure

label: Upper Limit of Normal column
description: Column containing the numeric upper limit of normal for each measure

label: Study Day column
description: Column containing the study day

label: Visit column
description: Column containing the visit name

label: Visit Number column
description: Column containing the visit number

label: Filters columns
description: List of columns to be used as filters

label: Group columns
description: List of columns to be used as grouping options

label: Alanine Aminotransferase value
description: Value used for Alanine Aminotransferase in the specified measure column

label: Aspartate Aminotransferase value
description: Value used for Aspartate Aminotransferase in the specified measure column

label: Total Bilirubin value
description: Value used for Total Bilirubin in the specified measure column

label: Alkaline Phosphatase value
description: Value used for Alkaline Phosphatase in the specified measure column

label: Baseline column
description: Column used to specify the baseline visit

label: Baseline values
description: Values used to specify the baseline visit in the specified baseline column

label: Analysis Flag column
description: Column used to specify which data rows should be included in the analysis

label: Analysis Flag values
description: Values used to specify which data rows should be included in the analysis

label: X axis options
description: Measures to be used as options for the x axis

label: Y axis options
description: Measures to be used as options for the y axis

label: Default Visit Window in Days
description: Visit window to be used to determine point fill on initial load

label: Show R Ratio Filter?
description: Include the R ratio filter in the chart?

label: Default R Ratio Cut
description: Cut point for the R ratio filter on initial load

label: Show Chart Title?
description: Show the chart title?

label: Warning text
description: Message test to be shown on initial load
